snippet: The family of an Ohio municipal worker, arrested more than three months ago while visiting North Korea, publicly offered a “heartfelt apology” to the North Korean authorities and pleaded for his release.
abstract: Family of Jeffrey E Fowle, Ohio municipal worker arrested while visiting North Korea, publicly offers its 'heartfelt apology' to North Korean authorities for whatever offense he may have committed; family is pleading for Fowle's release on humanitarian grounds.
lead_paragraph: The family of an Ohio municipal worker, arrested more than three months ago while visiting North Korea, publicly offered a “heartfelt apology” to the North Korean authorities and pleaded for his release.
